homePage.description: The ultimate specialized platform for medical professionals. Expert-validated questions, AI-powered insights, and personalized progress tracking.

bank.title: Extensive Question Bank
bank.description: Over 5,000 board-style questions covering Head, Neck, Spine, and General Neuroradiology.

tools.title: Clinical Tools
tools.description: Integrated calculators like NASCET score and detailed anatomical reference guides.

progress.title: Smart Tracking
progress.description: Visualize your strengths and weaknesses with our intuitive analytics dashboard.

ai.title: AI-Powered Learning
ai.description: GenAI-driven article discovery and deep-dive explanations for every concept.

validation.title: Expert Validated
validation.description: Content curated and reviewed by leading neuroradiology specialists.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Study in English, German, or Spanish with native-level professional translations.

progressPage.title: My Learning Progress
progressPage.description: Track your performance across all study sessions and topics.
progressPage.monthlyCorrectIncorrect: Correct vs. Incorrect answers by period.

chart.noDataForPeriod: No data available for the selected period.

progressPage.topicBreakdownDescription: Analyze your strengths and weaknesses by category and subcategory.

developedBySection.content: NeuroRadX was conceived and developed by Dr. Andres Pinta, a neuroradiologist with a passion for medical education and technology.

introductionSection.content: NeuroRadX is more than just a question bank; it is a comprehensive ecosystem designed to bridge the gap between clinical practice and academic excellence in neuroradiology.

whatIsNeuroRadXSection.title: What is NeuroRadX?
whatIsNeuroRadXSection.content: NeuroRadX provides a specialized learning environment for medical professionals focusing on neuroradiology. Our platform integrates advanced technology with expert medical knowledge to provide an unparalleled educational experience.

extensiveQuestionBank.title: Extensive Question Bank
extensiveQuestionBank.item2: Coverage of Head, Spine, Neck, and General Neuroradiology.

whoIsItForSection.title: Who is it for?
whoIsItForSection.intro: Designed for every stage of medical training and practice:

medicalStudents.descriptionPart: Essential for neuroanatomy and clinical basics.

residents.descriptionPart: The perfect companion for board preparation.

ourVisionSection.title: Our Vision
ourVisionSection.content: To become the global standard for neuroradiological education through innovation, accessibility, and expert validation.

myNotesPage.title: My Study Notes
myNotesPage.description: A collection of your personal annotations and insights for specific questions.
myNotesPage.errorLoadingNotesMeta: Could not load the list of your notes.
myNotesPage.errorLoadingFullNotes: An error occurred while loading question details for your notes.
myNotesPage.noNotesDescription: You haven't added any notes to questions yet. Start by using the 'My Notes' section during a study session!
myNotesPage.questionDetailMissing: Question details are no longer available.

deleteConfirmDialog.title: Delete Note?
deleteConfirmDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.

bookmarksPage.title: My Bookmarks
bookmarksPage.description: A collection of questions you've saved for later review.
bookmarksPage.noBookmarksDescription: You haven't bookmarked any questions yet. Click the
bookmarksPage.noBookmarksDescriptionAfterIcon: icon during a study session to save questions here.
bookmarksPage.errorLoadingIndex: Could not load your bookmark list.
bookmarksPage.errorLoadingQuestions: An error occurred while loading your bookmarked questions.

auth.loginRequiredMessageBookmarks: Please sign in to view and manage your bookmarks.
auth.loginRequiredMessageNotes: Please sign in to access and manage your personal notes.
auth.loginRequiredMessageProgress: Please sign in to track your learning progress and view detailed statistics.
auth.pleaseLogInSettings: Please sign in to view and modify your profile settings.
auth.accountSetupIncompleteDescription: Your user profile could not be found. Please contact support.
auth.accountStatusError: Your account is not active. Please contact an administrator.
auth.profileFetchErrorDescription: Failed to load your profile details.

pendingApprovalPage.title: Approval Pending
pendingApprovalPage.descriptionLine2: Your account is currently under review by our medical board.
pendingApprovalPage.contactSupport: If you have any questions, please contact support@neuroradx.de

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage users, content, and system communications.

searchUser.title: Search User
searchUser.description: Find users by email, display name, or unique ID.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: You do not have administrator permissions to view this page.

activeUsers.title: Active Users
activeUsers.description: List of all registered users and their statistics.

dialogs.resetDescription: This will clear all progress for {{name}}. This cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete {{name}}'s data from the database.

pendingUsers.description: Review and approve new user registrations.
pendingUsers.noPendingDesc: All new registrations have been processed.

reportedQuestionsPage.description: Review and manage issues reported by users.

resolveDialog.title: Resolve Issue
resolveDialog.description: Would you like to send a notification to the reporter about this fix?

reviewQuestions.title: Review Questions
reviewQuestions.description: Expert validation of the question bank.
reviewQuestions.noMoreQuestionsDescription: You have reviewed all available questions.
reviewQuestions.noSourceFound: No article reference found for this question.
reviewQuestions.noExplanation: No explanation available for this question.

toast.aiSearchFailedDescription: Could not automatically find a source.

reviewedReport.title: Reviewer Performance
reviewedReport.description: Statistics on question reviews and edits.
reviewedReport.tableDescription: Activity summary for all administrative users.

enrichQuestions.title: AI Content Enrichment
enrichQuestions.description: Automatically find scientific sources for questions using GenAI.

nascetCalculator.title: NASCET Score
nascetCalculator.context: North American Symptomatic Carotid Endarterectomy Trial formula.

sendNotification.title: Direct Message
sendNotification.description: Send a custom notification to a specific user.

searchDialog.title: Find User by Name
searchDialog.description: Search for users by their display name or email to get their UID.
searchDialog.noResults: No users found matching your search.

sentNotifications.title: Sent History
sentNotifications.description: Log of all outgoing system notifications.

archiveDialog.title: Archive Message?
archiveDialog.description: This removes it from the global log.

userNotificationsHistory.title: User History
userNotificationsHistory.description: All notifications sent to this specific user.

usersBySubscription.title: Abonnement Groups

ecmit.title: ECMIT Portal
ecmit.description: Materials for the European Course in Minimally Invasive Neurological Therapy.

evaluatorsPage.title: Evaluator Portal
evaluatorsPage.description: Invite specialists to review and validate content.

editQuestion.description: Search for a question by ID to modify its content or metadata.

validation.atLeastOneOption: At least one option is required.

tutor.name: Tutor
tutor.description: Get instant feedback and detailed explanations as you go.

exam.name: Exam
exam.description: Simulate a real test environment with a timer and final results.

flashcards.name: Flashcards
flashcards.description: Test your memory with rapid-fire anatomical and clinical cards.

studyMode.correctDefaultExplanation: Great job! You identified the correct answer.

reviewMistakes.noMistakesDescription: Great work! You don't have any incorrectly answered questions to review.

trialMessage.noQuestionsLeftLong: You have reached the trial limit of 50 questions.

sourceFilter.description: Filter questions by specific ECMINT courses and event days.

registrationForm.description: Start your specialized neuroradiology journey today.

registrationForm.agreeTo: By registering, you agree to our
registrationForm.trialInfoDescription: New accounts start with a 30-day trial including access to 50 questions.
registrationForm.errorTooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

loginForm.title: Welcome Back
loginForm.description: Sign in to continue your progress.

validation.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters.

shareDialog.description: Help spread the word! Share NeuroRadX with your colleagues and friends.

shareDialog.copiedErrorDescription: Could not copy link. Please try again or copy manually.

settingsPage.title: Account Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage your profile, visual preferences, and subscription.
settingsPage.profileInfoDesc: Manage your clinical and institution details.
settingsPage.roleManagedByAdmin: Your role is managed by administrators.
settingsPage.appearanceDesc: Customize how NeuroRadX looks for you.
settingsPage.textSizeDesc: Adjust the scale of typography across the app.
settingsPage.subscriptionDesc: Information about your current access level.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Manage your study statistics and history.
dataManagement.resetStatisticsWarning: Warning: This will permanently delete your entire study progress, accuracy data, and history.
dataManagement.disabledForTrial: Statistics reset is disabled during trial mode.

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.deleteAccountWarning: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.

deleteAccountDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountDialog.irreversible: This will permanently delete your profile, study history, and bookmarks. This action cannot be undone.

resetStatisticsDialog.title: Reset Statistics
resetStatisticsDialog.warning: You are about to clear all your progress.
resetStatisticsDialog.irreversible: This will reset all your scores and history to zero. This cannot be undone.
